texts: An annual Â£10 registration charge applies to each vehicle you add to this discount. The vehicle must have 9 seats or more to qualify, including the driver's seat.
You can select a vehicle that's already on your account or add a new one.
We don't hold any details for this vehicle. Make sure the number plate (Vehicle Registration Mark) is correct before continuing.

This vehicle is exempt from the Congestion Charge. This is based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today. It may change without notice - always check to see if you need to pay to drive within the zone.
